title: Ingestion Submission
description: Schema for metadata related to ingestion requests submitted to CGAP.

object_bucket.title: Object Bucket
object_bucket.description: The name of the S3 bucket in which the 'object_name' resides.

object_name.title: Object Name
object_name.description: The name of the S3 object corresponding to the submitted document.

ingestion_type.title: Ingestion Type
ingestion_type.description: The type of processing requested for this submission.

submission_id.title: Submission ID
submission_id.description: The name of a folder in the S3 bucket that contains all artifacts related to this submission.

parameters.title: Parameters
parameters.description: A record of explicitly offered form parameters in the submission request.

processing_status.title: Processing Status
processing_status.description: A structured description of what has happened so far as the submission is processed.

state.title: State
state.description: A state machine description of how processing is progressing (created, submitted, processed, or done).

outcome.title: Outcome
outcome.description: A token describing the nature of the final outcome, if any. Options are unknown, success, failure, or error.

progress.title: Progress
progress.description: An adjectival word or phrase assessing progress, such as 'started', 'awaiting prerequisites', '88% done', or 'unavailable'.

result.title: Result
result.description: An object representing a result if processing ran to completion, whether the outcome was success or failure.

errors.title: Errors
errors.description: A list of error messages if processing was aborted before results were obtained.

items.title: Error Message
items.description: One of possibly several reasons that processing was not completed.

additional_data.title: Additional Data
additional_data.description: Additional structured information resulting from processing, the nature of which may vary by ingestion_type and other factors.
